name: MOV
description:
This is my entry for the GMTK2020 game jam with the theme Out Of Control.

I had the idea of a "Zach-Like" where you don't have control over some of the inputs. That also makes it not very open-ended, so not really a Zach-Like, but let's not get into all that.

If you like it tell your friends, as I imagine I will need some help with discoverability if I want senpai to notice me.

The game is also a UX nightmare.
